title: Crash issues.
body: All it says is my game is crashed, and I attempt to reconnect after restarting both my client and computer. Does nothing. I don't have much open so it should not have this problem. I'm getting penalties for this atrocity and I'm sick of getting punished for something I can't seemingly help. I've tried several troubleshooters and none of them are working. Please help.

replies.body:
Hey Icarus Fell, 

I read over your issue and you may need to try Riots Crash KB. This should fix the issue you are having and get you back in game in no time! 

Crash KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes

I'll be on for a bit so if you have any questions or need help, feel free to reach out.
